leitej.util.data

Class SyncCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • leitej.util.data.SyncCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SyncCounter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An useful counter class, multi-thread safe.
    Author:
    Julio Leite
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • SyncCounter

        public SyncCounter()
        Creates a new instance of SyncCounter.

      • SyncCounter

        public SyncCounter(int min,
                   int startAt,
                   int max)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new instance of SyncCounter.
        Parameters:
        startAt - initial value of counter
        min - minimum value to be reached by the counter
        max - maximum value to be reached by the counter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if arguments give a illegal state for this counter

    • Method Detail

      • inc

        public boolean inc()
        Increases the value of the counter.
        Returns:
        false if the counter already reaches the maximum value allowed and don't change the counter

      • dec

        public boolean dec()
        Decreases the value of the counter.
        Returns:
        false if the counter already reaches the minimum value allowed and don't change the counter

      • getCount

        public int getCount()
        Gives the value of the counter.
        Returns:
        value
